item.name: Add Non Condo Policy with New Business (nonMSP)

body.raw:
{
	"policyTermKey"		:	null,
	
	"quoteNumber"		:	null,
	"applicationNumber"	:	null,
	"binderNumber"		:	null,
	"policyNumber"		:	"{{policyNumber}}",
	"effectiveDate"		:	"{{effectiveDate}}",
	"expirationDate"	:	"{{expirationDate}}",
	"policySubType"		:	"{{policySubType}}",
	"naicNumber"		:	{{naicNumber}},
	"followBilling"		:	"{{followBilling}}",
	"billingMethod"		:	"{{billingMethod}}",
	"agencyKey"			:	"{{agencyKey}}",
   
	"mailingAddress"	:{
						"addressLine1":"7208 Paseo Del Rio",
						"city":"Commerce",
    					"state":"CA",
    					"postalCode":"90040"
						},
   
   "numberOfUnitsCovered"	:	{{numberOfUnitsCovered}},
   
   
   "floodSopeDetails"		:{
				    		"hasFloodSope"		:	null,
    						"floodSopeStatement":	null
							},
   
   "insuredSignaturePresent"	:	null,
   
   "premiumAmount"			:	{{policyPremiumAmount}},
   "policyPaidIndicator"	:	{{policyPaidIndicator}},
   "premiumDueDate"			:	"2019-01-01",
   "premiumDueAmount"		:	2001,
   "MembershipFeeDueAmt"	:	2001,
   "LateFeeDueAmt"			:	2001,
   
   "insureds":[
			   {
				"title"			: "Mr",
        		"suffix"		: "",
        		"firstName"		:"Mohammad",
        		"lastName"		:"Saif",
        		"middleName"	:""
      }
   ],
   
   "cancellationDetails"	:	null,
   
   "reinstatementDetails"	:	null,
   
   "informationSourceDetails"	:{
								"sourceKey"		:	"{{sourceKey}}",
    							"issueDate"		:	"{{issueDate}}",
    							"receivedDate"	:	"2019-01-01",
    							"sourceType"	:	"{{sourceType}}",
    							"callerType"	:	"{{CallerType1}}",
    							"endorsementEffectiveDate"	:	"2019-01-01",
    
    "document":{
        		"documentId"		:	"{{documentId}}",
        		"documentType"		:	"{{documentType}}",
        		"documentSubType"	:	"{{documentSubType}}"
      },
      
      "clientPortfolioId"	:	{{clientPortfolioId}},
      "sessionKey"			:	"{{sessionKey}}",
      "ScanDate"			:	"2019-01-01"
   },
   
   "ProcessName":"ImportPinRequest",
   "userId":"{{userId}}",
   "policyState": "{{policyState}}",
   "isLpi":false,
   "lpiPolicyClientPortfolioIds":[

   ],
   
   "forceAdd"		:	false,
   "isDataFix"		:	false,
   "servicerName"	:	"string",
   "coveredEntities":[
				   {
        			"customerPropertyId"	:	{{customerPropertyId}},
        			"buildingId"			:	{{buildingId}},
        			"address":{
            		"addressLine1"			:	"123 Main St",
            		"city"					:	"Los Angeles",
            		"state"					:	"CA",
            		"postalCode"			:	"90032"
         },
         
    "premiumAmount"		:	{{propertyPremiumAmount}},
    "floodZone"			:	"A",
    "floodProgramType"	:	"R",
         
         "perils":[
            {
               "peril"					:	"Fire",
               "deductibleAmount"		:	1000,
               "replacementCostValue"	:	100,
               "coverages":[
                  {
                     "coverageAmount"	:	{{coverageAmount}},
                     "coverageType"		:	"{{coverageType}}",
                     "dwellingRcc"		:	true
                  }
               ]
            }
         ],
         
         "mortgageeClause":{
            "eClauseName":"Eclause 1",
            "address":{
               "addressLine1":"123 Main St",
               "city":"Los Angeles",
               "state":"CA",
               "postalCode":"90032"
            }
         }
      }
   ]
}

item.name: Verify that incoming MSP Policy is not load to SSP if it overlaps non MSP Policy with more than 30 days difference

exec: pm.test("Load to ODS eligable is: " + response.doesIncomingPinQualifyForMspRejection, function () {

body.raw:
{
	"policyTermKey"		:	null,
	
	"quoteNumber"		:	null,

						},

   "insureds":[
			   {
				"title"			: "Mr",
        		"suffix"		: "",
        		"firstName"		:"Mohammad",
        		"lastName"		:"Saif",
        		"middleName"	:""
      }
   ],
   
   "cancellationDetails"	:	null,
   
   "reinstatementDetails"	:	null,
   
   "informationSourceDetails"	:{

    							"issueDate"		:	"{{issueDate}}",
    							"receivedDate"	:	"2019-01-01",

        			"address":{
